about_the_game:
The Right to Bear Arms is a quirky souls-like action adventure in a simplistic cartoonish look that tells the story of Jacub and his friends who need to save the forest from the farm animals who threaten to take control of the last free enclave in Abearica.

Experience a story like no other, where Jacub, the protagonist, stumbles into a beer-induced adventure to save the freedom of the forest animals.

Fight for Freedom

As the player you will work with an arsenal of weapons to defeat various enemies. Switch between your weapons on the go to match the situation you're in. Use the hunter's rifle, the lumberjack's axe or just your bear arms.

But don't forget you're not invincible during the slaughter! Use a Dodge Roll to escape dangerous attacks and keep the enemy at a distance.

Explore Abearica

Explore the deep Forests and what secrets might lay beyond them. On your path to Freedom you can collect Cans to grow your power and spread even more fear among the enemy.



Play with your Friends

The Right to Bear Arms offers a online Co-Op mode where you can play with up to 3 of your friends through Steam. In addition to more fire power, you will also be able to revive your friends in combat. Look out for mysterious white mushrooms, as they might show you the fate of other players.
